svg.title: CM-19: Enterprise Context Architecture Blueprint
svg.desc: Comprehensive architectural diagram showing enterprise-scale context management infrastructure, multi-team coordination, context governance, and knowledge federation systems.

g.text: Context Infrastructure: $4.2M budget • Team allocation: 156 FTEs
Next-gen context AI: $2.1M allocated • ML optimization: $800K
Federated learning research: $600K • Patent portfolio: 12 filed
Context accuracy: 97.3% • Search relevance: 94.8% • Sync latency: 34ms
Next-generation federated learning • Timeline: Q2 2025 • Budget: $3.2M
APAC deployment: 8 new regions • EMEA enhancement: 12 countries
Latency targets: <50ms regional • Compliance: Local regulations
OpenAI partnership: Joint research • Anthropic collaboration: Context optimization
IEEE standards committee: Contributing member • Context architecture whitepaper
Conference speaking: 12 events planned • Thought leadership articles: 6 published
Access Control • Audit Trail • Compliance Monitoring
Distributed Storage • Version Control • Security • Backup & Recovery
GDPR (EU): Data residency + right to erasure
